SEARCH
Package branch

Class BranchList

java.lang.Object
branch.BranchList
public class BranchList extends Object
The BranchList class represents a list of branches. It provides methods to interact with the list of branches, such as retrieving the list, displaying open branches, and writing the list to a database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BranchList()
    Constructs a new BranchList object by reading the list of branches from a database.

  • Method Summary

    static void

    • BranchList

      public BranchList() throws IOException
      Constructs a new BranchList object by reading the list of branches from a database.

      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the branch list from the database.
